alert.note: Alert for Concho; Schleicher; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 16 at 7:22AM CDT until September 16 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Schleicher County in west central Texas... Southeastern Tom Green County in west central Texas... Southwestern Concho County in west central Texas... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 722 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Christoval, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Christoval around 725 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Adams. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
